content.rendered:
Dear customer,

we would like to inform you that on Monday 25th and Tuesday 26th of December 2023 LTL will be closed, reopen on Wednesday 27th of December 2023. LTL will also be closed on Monday 1st of January 2024, reopen on Tuesday 2nd of January 2024.
